Module org.nasdanika.diagram
Package org.nasdanika.diagram

Interface Diagram

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Adaptable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, Layer, Marked, Marked, ModelElement, NamedElement, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiagramImpl
    public interface Diagram
extends Layer
    A representation of the model object 'Diagram'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Vertical
    • Hide Empty Description
    • Hide Footbox
    • Type
    • Properties
    • Context
    • Depth
    • Layers
    See Also:
    DiagramPackage.getDiagram()

    • Method Detail

      • isVertical

        boolean isVertical()
        Returns the value of the 'Vertical' attribute. The default value is "true". Diagram direction - top-down if true (default), left to right if false.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Vertical' attribute.
        See Also:
        setVertical(boolean), DiagramPackage.getDiagram_Vertical()

      • setVertical

        void setVertical​(boolean value)
        Sets the value of the 'Vertical' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Vertical' attribute.
        See Also:
        isVertical()

      • isHideEmptyDescription

        boolean isHideEmptyDescription()
        Returns the value of the 'Hide Empty Description' attribute. Hides empty descriptions on state diagrams.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Hide Empty Description' attribute.
        See Also:
        setHideEmptyDescription(boolean), DiagramPackage.getDiagram_HideEmptyDescription()

      • setHideEmptyDescription

        void setHideEmptyDescription​(boolean value)
        Sets the value of the 'Hide Empty Description' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Hide Empty Description' attribute.
        See Also:
        isHideEmptyDescription()

      • isHideFootbox

        boolean isHideFootbox()
        Returns the value of the 'Hide Footbox' attribute. The default value is "true". Hides footbox on sequence diagrams.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Hide Footbox' attribute.
        See Also:
        setHideFootbox(boolean), DiagramPackage.getDiagram_HideFootbox()

      • setHideFootbox

        void setHideFootbox​(boolean value)
        Sets the value of the 'Hide Footbox' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Hide Footbox' attribute.
        See Also:
        isHideFootbox()

      • getType

        String getType()
        Returns the value of the 'Type' attribute. The default value is "plantuml:uml".
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Type' attribute.
        See Also:
        setType(String), DiagramPackage.getDiagram_Type()

      • setType

        void setType​(String value)
        Sets the value of the 'Type' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Type' attribute.
        See Also:
        getType()

      • getProperties

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<Property> getProperties()
        Returns the value of the 'Properties' containment reference list. The list contents are of type Property.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Properties' containment reference list.
        See Also:
        DiagramPackage.getDiagram_Properties()

      • getContext

        int getContext()
        Returns the value of the 'Context' attribute. The default value is "0". Depth of context elements to show on the diagram. Default is 0. -1 means no limit.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Context' attribute.
        See Also:
        setContext(int), DiagramPackage.getDiagram_Context()

      • setContext

        void setContext​(int value)
        Sets the value of the 'Context' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Context' attribute.
        See Also:
        getContext()

      • getDepth

        int getDepth()
        Returns the value of the 'Depth' attribute. The default value is "-1". Depth of the diagram partition elements. Default is -1 (no limit). Once the depth is reached content of partitions is not shown.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Depth' attribute.
        See Also:
        setDepth(int), DiagramPackage.getDiagram_Depth()

      • setDepth

        void setDepth​(int value)
        Sets the value of the 'Depth' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Depth' attribute.
        See Also:
        getDepth()

      • getLayers

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<Layer> getLayers()
        Returns the value of the 'Layers' containment reference list. The list contents are of type Layer. Diagram elements.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Layers' containment reference list.
        See Also:
        DiagramPackage.getDiagram_Layers()
